name: Malus/Talug
description: This character has a very unique and detailed design. They have a rooster for a head, a shirtless-muscular-human body, a shield in one hand and a whip in the other, a Greek warrior dress around his waist, a cape draped over one of his shoulders, serpentine bodies for legs, and canine heads for feet.

name: Ancient Glass Princess
description: Ancient Glass PrincessGenderFemaleAgeDeceasedSpeciesGlass PersonOccupationRuler of theGlass Kingdom(formerly)RelativesSee-Thru PrincessIntroduced in"Obsidian"Latest appearance"Obsidian"Voiced byCharlotte NicdaoAncient Glass Princesswas a character who appears in flashbacks in theAdventure Time: Distant Landsspecial "Obsidian". She is the former ruler of theGlass Kingdom.

name: The United Theme Park Security Force Chief
description: The United Theme Park Security Force ChiefAlso known asChiefGenderMaleOccupationUnited Theme Park Security Force's ChiefIntroduced inIssue 70Latest appearanceIssue 70United Theme Park Security Force Chief, is a character that shows up inIssue 71were he is guarding Adventure Town from some skateboarding kids. He is the Chief of The United Theme Park Security Force. He has the power to recruit new UTPSF members.

name: Magwood
description: Magwood is a powerful creature that is difficult to defeat even by the likes of Evergreen. The lava dog is able to increase in size when in danger. It is also capable of producing large quantities of lava from its body and using them offensively. Magwood's lava is hot enough to overcome Evergreen's ice magic. Even without lava powers, Magwood is still a formidable foe. The dog possesses great physical strength as it was able to significantly damage Evergreen's tower despite appearing to be in...

name: Party Bugs
description: TheParty Bugsare a group of various arthropods and invertebrates that are seen throwing or attending parties throughout theAdventure Timeseries. These include, but are not limited to,ladybugs,centipedes,beetles,ants,snails,scorpions,worms, and more.

name: Chatsberry
description: ChatsberryNameChatsberryGenderMaleAgeDeceasedSpeciesCandy ElementalOccupationElementalRelativesPrincess Bubblegum(reincarnation)Introduced in"Evergreen"Latest appearance"Jelly Beans Have Power"Voiced byAlan TudykChatsberryis a character that appears in "Evergreen." He is aCandy Elementaland one of the few characters known to exist before theMushroom War. He has been reincarnated as several beings, the most recent of which isPrincess Bubblegum.

name: Choose Goose
description: After drinking the ichor ofCoconteppi, he was driven to insanity and turned into an evil magic user. He was being contained in a cage under Simon's watch until Simon sacrificed him in a ritual to summonGOLB.

name: Fionna Lookalike
description: An unnamed humanwas briefly seen in "Cake the Cat". Cake initially believed she was Fionna, but upon seeing her from the front he saw her face was deformed and covered in purple welts.

name: Jay T. Doggzone
description: Finnand theIce Kinghave tried to use Dawgzone's advice to get women, butJakeaccuses the book of being full of bad advice, as seen in "Reign of Gunthers", and that he just keeps the book as a joke. There is no record of Doggzone's face being shown in the book, but he appears in the official artwork ofJesse Moynihanwhich shows Finn reading the book.

name: Gork
description: GorkNameGorkGenderMaleSpeciesCyclopsIntroduced in"Freak City"Voiced byMichael DornGorkfirst appears in the episode "Freak City." He is one of the people who was turned into a freakish body part byMagic Manand later combines with the other freaks to makeSuper Freak. He states that he is "leader" of Freak City, and is the most vocal of them. When they form the "Super Freak," he takes the role of the head.

name: Guy
description: Guy is mysterious, moody and dreamy. He seems to have a bad habit of lying about what kind of creature he is. Twice in the comic he tries to pass himself off as something that he isn't in order to win the sympathy of Princess Bubblegum (once by pretending to be a werewolf and once more by pretending to be a werefish.) It is also heavily implied that he only pretends to be a mysterious character in order to make himself seem interesting and to make himself feel less angsty.

name: Creepy Finn & Jake robots
description: InIssue 7, when Finn and Jake travel to the future, they learn that the robots turned evil when they were caught in the rain one day. After they were driven off, they built an army of evil robots that kept attacking Finn and his friends for fifteen years. Eventually, inIssue 9, the present Finn and Jake traveled back to their time and smashed the evil, creepy robots.
